segments.text: The colors in the kitchen are soft and soothing, yet they feel deceptive.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the cabinets filled with everyday objects, but they loom ominously in the background.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A part of me wishes I could step in, to prevent what’s bound to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water continues to flow over the sink, glistening in the sunlight but creating a dangerous situation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but admire how the quiet garden outside serves as a stark contrast to the tension inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What will happen when that boy loses his balance? I can almost envision the splash and chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This moment is a delicate balance of domesticity and disaster, and I’m just a witness to it all.
segments.speaker: PAR
